title: Grimbeorn the old---can he defend against more than one troll?

comments.content: Since grimbeorn doesn't exhaust to defend against troll enemies, does this mean he can defend against more than one troll attack during a round?

Zjb12 said:

 

 Since grimbeorn doesn't exhaust to defend against troll enemies, does this mean he can defend against more than one troll attack during a round?
